        The PromotionItem Management Menu
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • printPromotion

        public void printPromotion()
        Prints the CSV File of Promotions. (uses the globally defined "promotions" ArrayList from MainApp) (also calls the retrieveMenuItem method from FoodMenuUI)

      • addNewPromotion

        public void addNewPromotion()
        Method to add a new promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations from PromotionCSVHelper.)

      • editPromotion

        public void editPromotion()
        Method to edit an existing promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" AND "retrievePromotion" to facilitate I/O operations)

      • deletePromotion

        public void deletePromotion()
        Method to delete an existing promotion. (uses "writeToCsv" to facilitate I/O operations)

      • retrievePromotion

        @Nullable
public static @Nullable PromotionItem retrievePromotion(int targetPromoID)
        Returns a PromotionItem object that matches the input targetPromoID.
        Parameters:
        targetPromoID - ID of the promotion object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        promoObj Object containing a promotion's attributes.

      • menuTypeChecker

        public boolean menuTypeChecker(ArrayList<MenuItem> menuArrayList,
                               int newPromoItemType,
                               String textParameter)
        Returns true if the filtered array list contains the menu item type.
        Parameters:
        menuArrayList - filtered array list that contains menu items based on enum specified
        newPromoItemType - type of the menu item added to the promotion
        textParameter - text for the menu item type
